attributes.action: Make punishment for animal cruelty increased to custodial sentences
attributes.background: Animal cruelty is on the rise and punishment is currently not strong enough to deter it. In some cases the most horrific abuse suffered by these animals is punished with the guilty party ONLY banned from keeping pets. This may also only be for a few years. This should carry a custodial sentence.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

Animal cruelty offences can already attract a custodial sentence in some circumstances.

You can find more here:

https://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/CDP-2017-0109

You might like to start a new petition to increase the sentences available or sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232131
